availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John A. Y. Humphreys (Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer. Spotsylvania County, Virginia, native. Married to Martha Mays Humphreys in Nelson County on November 10, 1831. Married to Rebecca Delph Carpenter Humphreys in Nelson County on August 12, 1840. Father of Margaret Mildred Humphreys, John S. Humphreys, William T. Humphreys, Samuel C. Humphreys, and Thomas Jefferson Humphreys. Worked as a U. S. Commissioner in Nelson County in 1850. Owned seven enslaved persons in 1850. Farmer in Nelson County in 1860. Owned ten enslaved persons in 1860.
